General.Name: Bangkok Insurance Public Company Limited
General.Description: Bangkok Insurance Public Company Limited is involved in the non-life insurance business in Thailand. It offers fire, marine and transportation, cargo, motor, travel accident, personal accident, residential and commercial property, health, property, third party liability, business all risks, engineering, and miscellaneous insurance products. The company was incorporated in 1947 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
